text:
Abella Danger (born November 19, 1995) is an American pornographic actress and model. She was born in Miami, Florida.
Danger made her porno debut in July 2014 for Bang Bros. She has appeared in about 1010 credited scenes. She has appeared in mainstream news media other than adult news media, including the websites "Elite Daily" and "International Business Times".
In 2018, "Fortune" called her as one of the most popular and in-demand performers in the pornographic business.
